pageSetting.title: 机构理财产品销售报表

attribute.value: select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'KHLX'

SELECT cp.cpdm as key ,CP.CPMC as value FROM JXDX_LCCPXX CP INNER JOIN ( SELECT JY.cpdm FROM JXDX_LCJYLS JY WHERE JY.JYRQ BETWEEN CAST(CAST($tjrq$ AS CHAR(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) and (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' as integer)) and jy.khlx = '$khlx$' group by jy.cpdm)jy on jy.cpdm = cp.cpdm order by CP.CPMC

SELECT cp.cpdm ,CP.CPMC FROM JXDX_LCCPXX CP INNER JOIN ( SELECT JY.cpdm FROM JXDX_LCJYLS JY WHERE JY.JYRQ BETWEEN CAST(CAST($tjrq$ AS CHAR(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) and (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' as integer)) and jy.khlx = '$khlx$' GROUP BY JY.CPDM)JY on jy.cpdm = cp.cpdm order by CP.CPMC
